tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_audits (
  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_date DATE,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE data_breaches (
  breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  breach_date DATE,
  affected_table VARCHAR(50),
  breach_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE data_audit_reports ( 
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  report_date DATE, 
  auditor_name VARCHAR(50), 
  audit_comments TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE privacy_regulations ( 
  regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  regulation_name VARCHAR(50), 
  compliance_requirements TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE data_breaches ( 
  breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  breach_date DATE, 
  affected_records INT, 
  breach_details TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_data (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR,
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE data_sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR,
    data_type VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE data_audit_logs (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action VARCHAR,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DataAudits (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
    audit_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE PrivacyRegulations (
    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_name VARCHAR(100),
    regulation_description TEXT,
    regulation_penalty DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE DataBreaches (
    breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    breach_date DATE,
    affected_records INT,
    breach_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AuditRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_id INT,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    record_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE BreachNotifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    breach_id INT,
    notification_date DATE,
    notification_method VARCHAR(50)
)
